column4: Is anyone here competent with getting printers working?  I have a Dell AIO 922 and i cant find anything through google for help.

Is anyone here competent with getting printers working?  I have a Dell AIO 922 and i cant find anything through google for help.  I have the windows drivers on cdrom.  Isnt there a third party ubuntu program that interprets MS drivers?
check http://www.linuxprinting.org Dell AIO Printer A920 should work with a lexmark driver, maybe the 922 does so too?
i noticed that but i cant find that lexmark z600 in my cups program.  is there more cups drivers to be had?
